data.text:
TALBOT MUNDY: MESSENGER OF DESTINY.

(MUNDY, TALBOT). Grant, Donald M. (compiler).

West Kingston, Rhode Island: Donald M. Grant, Publisher, Inc., 1983. Large octavo, cloth. First edition. Signed by Grant on title page. Bio-bibliography with comprehensive illustrated checklist of Mundy's books and magazine appearances, an autobiography, biography by Peter Berresford Ellis, memoir by Mundy's wife, Dawn Mundy Provost, essays by Darrel Crombie and Fritz Leiber, an article on Mundy's writings published in Adventure, and other material. A fine copy in a nearly fine dust jacket with a touch of rubbing and slight wear to the extremities. (24945). Item #24945

Price: $35.00
